items.sentence: Some of our members weren\'t able to attend the meeting.
Tom is furious that Mary is going to Boston without him.
Tom is the only one in our class who can play the banjo.
Tom knew it was foolish to go out by himself after dark.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t have done that without your help.
Tom and Mary don\'t understand what you want them to do.
I had to shoot my horse because he was in a lot of pain.
I have not eaten any seafood since the recent oil spill.
I didn\'t think Tom would want to go to Boston with you.
I think that I\'ve convinced Tom not to do that anymore.
